title: already did the hextex bullshit and repaired it said it was fine
body: why is this so hard to fix i did every thing you wanted and the shit still doesnt work. so thank you for making me install more bullshit for it not to work

replies.body: It depends on the issue and the steps taken to troubleshoot it.  If you're trying to repair files for a connection issue for example, then you might not yield the results you want.  I'd be happy to help, just let me know about your issue.
